attributes.action: tell us what taxes will rise or be introduced to replace the lost billions if we all switch to electric cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we all start changing to electric cars over the next few years as apparently the government want us to (hence the upcoming subsidies), where will the billions of pounds currently raised through fuel duty come from? Will perhaps road tax be increased to thousands of pounds a year or am I being cynical in thinking that road pricing may not actually be a purely environmental step.

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions which call upon the PM to "recognise", "explain" or "acknowledge" something, as they do not clearly call for a recognisable action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
